grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 年年歳歳【ネンネンサイサイ】annually, every year, year in year out, from year to year
歳暮【セイボ】year-end gift, end of the year, year end
kun reading compounds: 年【とし】year, age, years, past one's prime, old age
大年【おおとし】New Year's Eve, December 31st, Jupiter (planet)
年【とせ】counter for years (following a number in the hito-futa-mi counting system)
千年【せんねん】millennium, one thousand years, long time
